summary: A mini-series based on the novel of the same name by Boris Akunin.
cast: Ilya Noskov|Marina Neyolova|Sergey Bezrukov|Larisa Borushko|Sergey Chonishvili|Marina Aleksandrova|Kirill Pirogov|Oleg Basilashvili|Ewa Szykulska|Feliks Antipov|Dmitri Burkhankin|Yuri Avsharov|Aleksandr Orlovskiy|Vasiliy Kupriyanov|Valentin Golubenko|Evgeniy Grishkovets|Aleksandr Soldatov|Lyubov Rudneva|Viktor Abrosimov|Nikolai Zhirnov|Aleksei Golovin|Sergey Frolov|Pavel Abdalov|Aleksandr Komissarov|Aleksei Silayev|Ivan Rokhdutin|Denis Shutilov|Viktor Polyakov|Nikolay Kolchitskiy|Georgi Shmelyov|Yuriy Potyomkin|Aleksandr Fursenko|Aleksandr Ablizov|Aleksandr Sukharev|Igor Gusev|Aleksandr Kuzmichyov|Igor Pismennyy|Yuriy Nifontov|Vyacheslav Zholobov|Aleksandr Pozharov|Tamara Tsyganova|Lyubov Anisimova|Boris Panin|Yuri Amigo|Oleg Lopukhov|Vlad Ivanov|Valentin Samokhin|Jaroslav Venlik|Zdenek Kupka|Ivan Mokhovikov|Sergei Gorbatov|Aleksandr Ablyazov|Marina Alekseeva
title: Azazel
